name: Music Festival
description: Enjoy live music performances from various artists in the beautiful setting of Central Park. This event is free for all attendees.

name: Food Truck Festival
description: Indulge in a variety of delicious cuisines from food trucks gathered at Downtown Square. Admission requires a paid entry.

name: Art Exhibition
description: Explore breathtaking artworks by local and international artists at the City Art Gallery. Admission to this exhibition is free.

name: Movie Night
description: Experience outdoor movie screenings under the stars at City Park. Bring your blankets and snacks for a cozy movie night. Admission is free.

name: Craft Fair
description: Browse through unique handmade crafts and artisanal products at the Craft Fair held at the Convention Center. Admission requires a paid entry.

name: Book Launch
description: Join us for the launch of the latest bestselling book at the Local Bookstore. Meet the author and get your copy signed. Admission is free.

name: Fashion Show
description: Experience the latest trends and designs at the Fashion Show hosted at Fashion Mall. Grab your front-row seats with a paid entry.

name: Street Market
description: Discover a vibrant mix of local vendors and artisans at the Street Market located in the bustling City Streets. Admission is free.

name: Live Concert
description: Get ready to rock out to your favorite bands at the Live Concert held at the Outdoor Arena. Secure your tickets for a memorable night of music.

name: Outdoor Yoga
description: Unwind and rejuvenate with a serene session of outdoor yoga by the beach. All levels welcome. Bring your yoga mat and join us for free.
